review: I was pleasantly surprised by the Amazon Fire TV.  From the packaging to the Fire TV device itself, everything had a quality feel.  The unit is small and fits just about anywhere, and I was able to quickly set up Netflix, HuluPlus, and HBOGO with minimal effort.  Although I purchased it at a discount I feel that it is well worth the retail price.  It does exactly what I purchased it for, and the voice search is a useful feature. Initial setup for connecting to my wireless router went smoothly.  I have only had it for a short time, but so far I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
